headline: ZTR: Hybrid Portfolio With Utility Tilt At A Deep Discount
summary: Virtus Total Return Fund offers a 9.52% yield, supported by a hybrid portfolio tilted toward utilities and industrials. Find out why ZTR CEF is a Buy.

headline: How Recent Nuclear And AI Deals Are Shaping The Story For NextEra Energy (NEE)
summary: The latest update on NextEra Energy keeps the story constructive, with the model fair value estimate nudged to US$90.83 from US$91.14 and the discount rate assumption essentially steady at 6.96%. Long term revenue growth is now set at 11.69%, compared with 11.69% previously, reflecting only a very small adjustment that lines up with mixed but generally supportive analyst commentary. Continue with this article to see how you can keep on top of these subtle shifts in the narrative as they...

headline: Symmetry Deal And Google Cloud Expansion Could Be A Game Changer For NextEra Energy (NEE)
summary: NextEra Energy previously filed a US$4.00 billion at-the-market follow-on common stock offering and has now completed its acquisition of Symmetry Energy Solutions, expanding its natural gas supply and asset management reach across 34 states. Together with an expanded Google Cloud partnership to support new data center campuses, these moves highlight how NextEra is aligning its generation and fuel portfolio with rising AI-driven power demand.
